# vpsie_dns_record (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "vpsie_dns_record" "example" {
  domain_identifier = "domain-identifier"
  name              = "www"
  content           = "192.168.1.1"
  type              = "A"
  ttl               = 3600
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `content` (String)
- `domain_identifier` (String)
- `name` (String)
- `type` (String)

### Optional

- `ttl` (Number)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
